params.name: categoryId
params.doc: ID of category to which events should be assigned.

docs.summary: Assigns events to a single category.

params.name: categoryId
params.doc: A list of category IDs to which events should be assigned.

docs.summary: Assigns filtered events to multiple categories.
Unassigns filtered events from multiple categories.

params.name: categoryId
params.doc: ID of category to be deleted.

docs.summary: Retrieves a list of categories that are not in the `HIDDEN` state.
Creates a query to retrieve a list of categories.
description: The `queryCategories()` function builds a query to retrieve a list of categories and returns a [`CategoriesQueryBuilder`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-events-v2/categories/categoriesquerybuilder) object.

The returned object contains the query definition, which is typically used to run the query using the [`find()`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-events-v2/categories/categoriesquerybuilder/find) function.

You can refine the query by chaining `CategoriesQueryBuilder` functions onto the query. `CategoriesQueryBuilder` functions enable you to sort, filter, and control the results `queryCategories()` returns.
`queryCategories()` runs with these `CategoriesQueryBuilder` defaults, which you can override:

docs.summary: Change the order of events that are assigned to the same category on the Events Widget.

members.name: categoryId
members.doc: ID of category to which events should be assigned.

members.name: totalFailures
members.doc: Number of items that couldn't be processed.

members.name: totalSuccesses
members.doc: Number of items that were successfully processed.

members.name: undetailedFailures
members.doc: Number of failures without details due to exceeding the threshold for detailed failures.

members.name: categoryId
members.doc: A list of category IDs to which events should be assigned.

members.name: assignedEventsCount
members.doc: Total number of published events assigned to the category. Deleted events are excluded.

members.name: counts
members.doc: The total number of draft and published events assigned to the category.

members.name: states
members.doc:
Category state. Possible values:
- `MANUAL`: Category is created manually by the user.
- `AUTO`: Category is created automatically.
- `RECURRING_EVENT`: Category is created automatically when publishing recurring events.
- `HIDDEN`: Category can't be seen.

Default: `MANUAL`.

**Note:** The WIX_EVENTS.MANAGE_AUTO_CATEGORIES permission is required to use other states than `MANUAL`.

members.name: assignedDraftEventsCount
members.doc: Total number of draft events assigned to the category.

members.name: assignedEventsCount
members.doc: Total number of published events assigned to the category. Deleted events are excluded.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor string pointing to the next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to the previous page in the list of results.

members.name: categoryId
members.doc: ID of category to be deleted.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Item ID. Should always be available, unless it's impossible (for example, when failing to create an item).

members.name: error
members.doc: Details about the error in case of failure.

members.name: originalIndex
members.doc: Index of the item within the request array. Allows for correlation between request and response items.

members.name: success
members.doc: Whether the requested action was successful for this item. When `false`, the `error` field is populated.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load per page.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging is used and the `tooManyToCount` flag is not set.

members.name: fieldset
members.doc:
Predefined sets of fields to return.
- `COUNTS`: Returns `assignedEventsCount`.

members.name: fieldset
members.doc:
Predefined sets of fields to return.
- `COUNTS`: Returns `assignedEventsCount`.

members.name: query
members.doc: Query options. See [API Query Language](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/api-query-language) for more details.

members.name: paging
members.doc:
Pointer to page of results using offset.
See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the form [{"fieldName":"sortField1"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","direction":"DESC"}]
See [supported fields](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/filter-and-sort#wix-events_wix-events_filter-and-sort_list-query-events).

members.name: paging
members.doc:
Pointer to page of results using offset.
See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by

members.name: assignedEventsCount
members.doc: Total number of published events assigned to the category. Deleted events are excluded.

members.name: counts
members.doc: The total number of draft and published events assigned to the category.

members.name: states
members.doc:
Category state. Possible values:
- `MANUAL`: Category is created manually by the user.
- `AUTO`: Category is created automatically.
- `RECURRING_EVENT`: Category is created automatically when publishing recurring events.
- `HIDDEN`: Category can't be seen.

Default: `MANUAL`.

**Note:** The WIX_EVENTS.MANAGE_AUTO_CATEGORIES permission is required to use other states than `MANUAL`.
